body:
Hi,


I would like to ask if anybody managed to run photon mapping in Mac.  
The only info I found in the forum was from Giulio Antonutto advising  
to download the following:


radiance 3.5 binaries and pmap 3.28. The link to download the archives  
is not online anymore so I would like to know if there is any way to  
install pmap using the latest radiance binaries in a Mac.


Cheers,


George
